div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 683 Costesti, c. 35 km. SE of Deva, Ru- mania, 1962 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: c. 240 AR. Pot hoard Imit. Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. Apollonia, Illyria: dr. Dyrrhachium: dr. Roman Rep.: den. Disposition: Cluj Mitrea, Dacia 1965, p. 490 (Bolsaia)
